EmailTemplate.name: Tech Pubs Tech Pubs GEM Denial
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Honeywell Tech Pubs Request {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting the Honeywell Aerospace Technical Publications Team on {!Case.Order_Entered__c} with your request for technical publications:
<Insert publication numbers and description>
Unfortunately, we’re not able to fulfill your request. The technical data you asked for is limited to customers who’ve purchased the applicable tooling directly from Honeywell.
If you believe that we’re mistaken, and you did purchase the applicable tooling to qualify for access to these publications, please let us know, and we’ll launch a review to double-check.
For Case Related Questions?
We’ll connect all of your inquiry details through the subject line of this email. So, should you reply, please leave the subject line unchanged to make sure your response is routed immediately to this case.
Thanks again! We appreciate your business,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName} Honeywell Aerospace Technical Publications Team Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com 1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099
ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Description} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
This e-mail message and any attachment(s) are for the use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain proprietary and/or confidential information, which may be privileged or otherwise protected from disclosure. Further, information contained herein, U.S. Export Control laws may control including attached files. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure or distribution of this communication in whole or in part without the express written consent of Honeywell, or the U.S. Government as required, is prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient(s), please contact the sender by reply email and destroy the original message and any copies of the message as well as any attachment(s) to the original message.
